meta_info.name: ITEM_TREE
meta_info.description: Logical tree data structure. The tree may be empty. Used for representing data which are logically a tree such as audiology results, microbiology results, biochemistry results.

functions.name: has_element_path
functions.meaning: True if path  a_path' is a valid leaf path.

functions.name: element_at_path
functions.meaning: Return the leaf element at the path  a_path'.

functions.name: as_hierarchy
functions.meaning: Generate a CEN EN13606-compatible hierarchy, which is the same as the tree's physical representation.

attributes.name: items
attributes.description: The items comprising the `ITEM_TREE`. Can include 0 or more `CLUSTERs` and/or 0 or more individual `ELEMENTs`.
